column4: I am a student from India. I have installed ubuntu10.10 and tried to connect reliance net connect+ modem. but ubuntu is not recognizing the modem.what shall i do? any help please
run:  lsusb    use the 8 character hex ID for the device to help find guides
I did run lsusb. I got Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. EC1260 Wireless Data Modem HSD USB Card got detected in it
I did not understand how to see the help for that?
